page.title: 18AERIAL VIEWS OF THE D-BLOCK
page.content: COURTESY OF A PARENT, MR.RAY BOND, 5 OF THE DOMESDAY TEAM WERE ABLE TO FLY OVER THE D-BLOCK AND TAKE AERIAL PHOTOGRAPHS. IN PARTICULAR WE ENJOYED THE EXPERIENCE OF BEING IN A SMALL PLANE, VERY CLOSE TO THE GROUND AND YET FAR ENOUGH AWAY TO SEE THE WHOLE BLOCK AT ONCE. TAKING THE PHOTOGRAPHS WAS HARD AS YOU HAD TO KEEP THE CAMERA VERY STILL AND NEAR THE GLASS OF THE WINDOW, NOT EASY WHEN YOU ARE BEING THROWN ABOUT BY TURBULENCE. THE ROMAN FORT OUTLINE WAS VERY CLEAR ON USHERCOME FARM AND YOU COULD SEE VERY FAINT PARTS ON THE TADMARTON GOLF COURSE. SCHOOL LOOKED VERY SMALL AND INSIGNIFICANT FROM UP ABOVE IN THE CLOUDS BUT BROUGHTON CASTLE LOOKED MAJESTIC AND THE MOAT WAS VERY BLUE. A GREAT EXPERIENCE FOR CAROLINE BOND, JOCASTA CROFTS, STUART HUDSON, CARADOC GLAISYER & ADEMOLA FORSYTHE.
